DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: To investigate the uptake of VLDL-TG in visceral fat in lean and overweight individuals
DOC.brief_title: Very-low-density-lipoprotein Triglyceride (VLDL-TG) Uptake in Visceral Fat
DOC.criteria: Healthy Age: 2050 years Premenopausal Smoking Alcohol abuse Use of medications
